scripts.fsm.main()[source]¶

Main function.

This function initializes the ROS node and creates and executes the state machine.

Parameters:None – No parameters are passed to this function.
Returns:None
scripts.fsm.move_to_position_client(client, x, skip)[source]¶

Function that sends a goal to a ROS action server.

Parameters:
  • client (actionlib.SimpleActionClient) – The action client.
  • x (str) – The goal to send to the action server.
  • skip (bool) – Boolean to skip battery cancel.
Returns:

The result of the action.
Return type:

PlanningResult

Battery state¶

scripts.BatteryState.BatteryState()[source]¶

Function to handle battery status.

This function continually checks whether the robot’s battery is charging or discharging, based on the state of the parameter ‘ImCharging’. It also publishes through the topic “BatteryState” the battery status at regular intervals.

Parameters:None (None) – No parameters are passed to this function.
Returns:None

Movements¶

scripts.movements.simulating_movements(goal)[source]¶

Function to simulate robot movements loosing time.

Parameters:goal (PlanningGoal) – The goal message received from the action client. It contains the target room identifier and a flag to determine if the robot should skip the battery check.
Return type:None

The function first checks if the server received a preemption request from the client. If not, it proceeds to simulate the movement by sleeping for the specified duration. The robot’s position and timestamps are updated in the ontology at the end of the movement. If a preemption request is received, it interrupts the movement and sends a result back to the client.

Ontology¶

scripts.ontology.service_callback(request)[source]¶

This function is the callback for the initmap_service. It loads the topological map, adds properties to the ontology, initialize the time in which the rooms have been visited (useful for the urgency threshold)and updates timestamps.

Parameters:request (Empty) – The request message received from the service client.
Return type:list
Returns:Empty list, since no specific return value is required for this service.
